programme.title: Cat 8
programme.desc: As a huge mass of seething solar plasma heads toward Earth, the atmosphere will be ignited in a matter of hours. Even if scientist Michael can reverse the oncoming threat, the after-effects are something even he couldn't have predicted. With chaos spreading quickly and government officials giving up hope, can anything be done to save the world? Conclusion of the sci-fi drama, starring Matthew Modine, Maxim Roy and Ted Whittall.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: Another selection of internet-sourced videos, including a woman attempting to break a world record with marshmallows and holiday-makers travelling to unwise destinations.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Chinese Food in Minutes
programme.desc: Two carpenters hope to swap their hammers for woks and learn to make quick and easy oriental dishes, so cook Ching-He Huang teaches them how to prepare noodle-based dishes, including rice wine and peppered beef, Taiwanese ginger and sesame chicken, and mixed seafood.(n)

programme.title: Poppy Cat
programme.desc: Owl's sunflower is beginning to droop, so Poppy suggests a trip to Sunnyside Island to revive it, but their boat goes off course along the way.(n)

programme.title: Puffin Rock
programme.desc: Children's animation following the adventures of a family of puffins living on a wild and beautiful Irish island. Narrated by Chris O'Dowd.(n)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: A babysitter has a lot to cope with when she looks after Simon and Gaspard.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Horatio Fixham's historical ship needs mending after a storm. Scoop finds the crow's nest and keeps it, not realising that Bob needs it for the repairs.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Float Your Boat Tom, Charlie and the Twins spend the day at the beach. But when Tom takes a rest on his dingy he finds out that he's been washed out to sea when he wakes up.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: When Gordon is late, Henry is asked to pull the Express. However, Gordon is unhappy that he has to take over the other train's work and goes on strike.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive monkey buys Kemi some flowers for her birthday, then sets off on a train to hand-deliver them.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Nazboo gets sick with the dragon pox, so Leah, Shimmer and Shine set out on an adventure to find the magical cure.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: The Case of the Sticker Mystery.
programme.desc: New stickers with a picture of a mysterious bandit have appeared in Toyland, so Clockwork Mouse asks Noddy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger drops off a gift to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms.(n)

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and the stakes are high, ten-year-old Rusty Rivets invents his way out of every jam by repurposing parts and objects into the wildest, greatest contraptions ever!.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Prolems ensue when Digby and Grumpy try to deliver a barrel of nuts up to Chips' treehouse. Animated adventures for younger viewers.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends have to build castles and bring them into playgroup. Mummy and Daddy Pig have lots of fun helping Peppa make hers, if only they could find the glitter.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Pedro Pony pretends to be a cowboy and tells stories in a camp he has set up in the garden.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Kerry is having a pyjama party and Mofy invites the squirrels, but Lee is too busy cleaning the nest so Sioux experiences his first sleepover without him.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Part two of two. The elves and fairies meet the Great Leader, before the Wise Old Elf makes the planet beautiful again.(n)

programme.title: Floogals
programme.desc: The aliens see an extraordinary sight in the sky, but by the time they reach the garden for a better view it has disappeared.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: It's business as usual at the Skeldale Veterinary Centre, where the current crop of vets work hard to uphold the high standards of care set by their famous predecessor, All Creatures Great and Small author James Herriot. In this last visit to the surgery, the staff tend to a poodle with a problem penis, a rabbit with a tooth abscess, an over-amorous donkey and a cow with a large wound to her neck. Later, as the day's work begins to wind down, the vets prepare to say goodbye to Sarah, who is leaving to have a baby.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: A chance to catch up with the latest events inside the house as the celebrities cope with living under constant surveillance, with all the arguments and alliances, as well as the revelations in the diary room.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Hunter comes clean to Irene about his part in the diner robbery, Justin takes action when another private detective finds Scarlett, and Irene and Marilyn try to cheer up Kat.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya and Toadie's first counselling session since their separation gets off to an awkward start. Jack is disappointed at Paige's refusal to allow Steph to spend any time with Gabe.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A serial killer begins posting footage of his crimes online - and as the agents investigate, they realise that each film contains visual clues to the identity of the next victim. In a further bizarre twist, Abby later finds what seems to be a new video on her computer - and the case takes on fresh urgency with the discovery that it is actually a live feed, suggesting the murderer is somewhere on the premises.(n)

programme.title: Heart of the Country
programme.desc: The wife of a Wall Street stockbroker finds her glamorous existence brought crashing to a halt when her husband is imprisoned for fraud. Forced to return to rural North Carolina where she grew up, she attempts to make peace with her estranged father and deal with unresolved issues surrounding the death of her mother. Drama, starring Jana Kramer and Gerald McRaney.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya and Toadie's first counselling session since their separation gets off to an awkward start. Jack is disappointed at Paige's refusal to allow Steph to spend any time with Gabe.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Hunter comes clean to Irene about his part in the diner robbery, Justin takes action when another private detective finds Scarlett, and Irene and Marilyn try to cheer up Kat.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: The Grand Prix of Austria. Action from the 11th meeting of the season, staged at the Spielberg Red Bull Ring. The undulating terrain and naturally created arena are trademark features of the circuit, along with its 18-metre-high landmark Bull of Spielberg statue in its centre.(n)

programme.title: All New Traffic Cops
programme.desc: North Yorkshire officers are called out to a massive crash near a theme park that has resulted in the death of at least one person. The need to understand what has happened and who - if anyone - is to blame tests the resources of all the traffic cops who attend and then investigate this fatal incident. Will their gut instincts that this is a drug-fuelled disaster prove correct?.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother
programme.desc: Marcus Bentley narrates as the housemates lie in their beds, chat on the sofas and argue in the kitchen - all for the enjoyment of the viewers. Will they find being watched by Big Brother's cameras any harder to cope with than life in the public eye?.(n)

programme.title: Make or Break
programme.desc: Stephen dishes out some home truths to Elle, but her reaction proves to be more than he bargained for. Karl is left dumbstruck when Holly receives a visitor from home, and Andy faces up to his darker issues.(n)

programme.title: Celebrity Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the CBB companion show, featuring gossip, chat and features from the house. Including a debate on the burning issues, celebrity guests' thoughts on the latest developments and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: Two straight-laced friends pose as drug dealers and try their best -- and sometimes fail -- to fit in with the thug circle in order to retrieve a stolen kitten(n)

programme.title: Manhunter
programme.desc: Dark thriller about an ex-FBI forensic investigator who is called in to track down a brutal serial killer known as 'the Tooth Fairy'. To help him understand the mind of his quarry, he visits the prison which holds an old adversary of his - notorious serial killer Dr Hannibal 'the Cannibal' Lektor. But the investigation comes to threaten his sanity and the lives of his family(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: Enterprising teenager Joel Goodsen turns his parents' house into a brothel when they go out of town on a trip(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror thriller, an unconventional exorcist battles a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar!
programme.desc: This outlandish comedy set in the golden age of showbiz centers on a slick Hollywood fixer named Eddie Mannix, who is pressed into action when a superstar actor is kidnapped and held for ransom. Mannix must race to quietly collect the ransom money before the gossip mags catch wind of the scandal(n)

programme.title: Rock Star
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg stars in this modern-day fairy tale about the lead singer of a heavy-metal tribute band who joins the real group when its front man quits, and immediately gets in way over his head in a dizzying world of sex, drugs, and rock and roll. Jennifer Aniston, Timothy Spall, Dominic West, Jason Bonham, Timothy Olyphant, Jason Flemyng(n)

programme.title: Puerto Ricans in Paris
programme.desc: Two Puerto Rican NYC cops (Luis Guzman and Edgar Garcia) are asked by a pair of French fashion designers (Alice Taglioni and Frederic Anscombre) to come to Paris to hunt down the counterfeiters who stole a couture handbag. Rosie Perez and Rosario Dawson co-star. Directed by Ian Edelman(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Two US marines who fought together in war are reunited in a battle against the military. When one of the men is threatened with court martial for his involvement in the death of 83 civilians, he calls on his former colleague, who is embittered by his Vietnam injuries, to act as his attorney. As the men seek revenge against the military system, a high-level political conspiracy unravels(n)

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: After his wife gives birth to a stillborn child, the American ambassador to Britain switches two kids in their hospital cribs. What he doesn't know is that little Damien is the Anti-Christ. Seminal 70s horror(n)

programme.title: Ouija: Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic (Elizabeth Reaser) is stunned when she obtains a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for her business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her nine-year-old daughter (Lulu Wilson). Directed by Mike Flanagan, this horror sequel co-stars Annalise Basso, Henry Thomas, and Doug Jones(n)

programme.title: Incarnate
programme.desc: In this terrifying horror thriller, an unconventional exorcist battles a malevolent demon that has taken over an innocent 11-year-old boy. Later, he learns that the paranormal entity is also responsible for the deaths of his wife and child(n)

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: Writer-director Paul W.S. Anderson's turbo-charged, slam-bang tune-up of Roger Corman's 1975 cult vehicle "Death Race 2000" follows the non-stop action taking place during a do-or-die contest pitting a convict (Jason Statham) against other cons, with the winner walking off with his freedom. Anderson admits to being "a big fan of the Corman movie," and this reworking is a glowing salute to Corman's original. Corman also serves as one of the film's producers, along with Anderson and Tom Cruise(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent infiltrates a group of extreme athletes who are using their specialized skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. Remake of the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Blinded by toxic waste as a child, Matt Murdock develops superhuman awareness and balance which enable him to tackle New York's worst villains(n)

programme.title: Miss March
programme.desc: Zach Cregger and Trevor Moore wrote, directed and star in this uproarious road romp about a young man (Cregger) who's been in a coma for four years and awakens to discover that his chaste high-school sweetheart is now a men's-magazine centerfold, so he sets off to reconnect with her and consummate their relationship. Moore plays his horn-dog best friend who is with him every step of the zany way. Raquel Alessi, Craig Robinson, Alexis Raben, Eve Mauro. Hugh Hefner has a cameo as himself(n)

programme.title: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Martha finally finds her Mr. Right, but he has just one flaw: he is a hitman on the run from his former employers, a crime cartel(n)

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: Two longtime friends take stock of their accomplished artistic careers in this meditative drama written and directed by Paolo Sorrentino. Michael Caine stars as Fred Ballinger, a retired composer who, at the behest of his daughter (Rachel Weisz), is on vacation in the Alps with his friend Mick Boyle (Harvey Keitel), a filmmaker currently working on a new project. Fred believes he is enjoying his retirement, but he is soon approached with an offer of a British knighthood if he'll conduct a performance of a famous piece he wrote(n)

programme.title: Fierce People
programme.desc: Actor-turned-director and producer Griffin Dunne (Practical Magic, Addicted to Love) teams up with scenarist Dirk Wittenborn for the slice-of-life ensemble drama Fierce People. As summer encroaches, 16-year-old Manhattanite Finn Earl (Anton Yelchin) would love nothing more than to trek off to South America and spend the year's sun-drenched months near the equator, embarking on thrilling adventures with his estranged archaeologist father, whom he's never met. Alas, the bonds of family rein in tight when Finn's booze- and coke-addled mother, the masseuse Liz (Diane Lane), cries out for help -- and, in the process, unwittingly gets Finn arrested. In a dramatic attempt to reverse circumstances and sort out the complications in both of their lives, Liz insists on taking custody of Finn for the summer. Both, she insists, will live in the home of one of her former massage clients, the aging billionaire Ogden C. Osborne (Donald Sutherland) -- with whom she may be amorously involved. Though Finn agrees begrudgingly at first, in time he finds the environment welcoming -- as he develops a crush on Ogden's gorgeous granddaughter (Kristen Stewart) and befriends Ogden's grandson. But when an unforeseen and shocking act of violence erupts, it estranges Finn and Liz from their posh surroundings and provides a sobering, harrowing reminder of the socioeconomic differences between the Earls and their new friends(n)

programme.title: The Color of Money
programme.desc: Paul Newman racked up an Oscar reprising his role from "The Hustler", a pool shark who takes a hotshot under his wing(n)

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: A thief enlists the help of mythical Egyptian gods to overthrow a vicious ruler(n)

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: (2010) Michael Cera (Juno, Superbad) stars in this unconventionally structured, inventive and comic paean to the alternate universe of manga and computer gaming. The movie is based on an acclaimed series of graphic novels by Canadian cartoonist Bryan Lee O'Malley, and is directed by British film-maker Edgar Wright (Shaun of the Dead, Channel 4's TV series Spaced), here making his Hollywood debut. Computer game fanatic Scott Pilgrim (Cera) is the bass player with Toronto band Sex Bob-omb. He shares his flat with his slightly-out-of-control gay friend Wallace Wells (Kieran Culkin), and courts a little controversy by dating 17-year-old schoolgirl Knives Chau (Ellen Wong). However, theirs is a fairly platonic relationship, and one he's prepared to ditch the moment he sets eyes on the woman (literally) of his dreams: Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead). But if Scott wants to capture the impossibly cool New Yorker's heart, he must first defeat her former lovers, the Seven Evil Exes, in video game end-level-style combat. So he embarks on a kinetic, romantic quest, largely conducted within his own head, replete with slapstick violence, impressive effects and witty retorts(n)

programme.title: Hamlet 2
programme.desc: Comedy about a failed actor turned drama teacher who, in a final and deluded attempt to make an impact, sets about creating a controversial and 'inspirational' sequel to William Shakespeare's Hamlet(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In the next installment of the "Maze Runner" franchise Thomas (Dylan O'Brien), Teresa (Kaya Scodelario) and the rest of the Gladers search for clues about WCKD, a powerful organization in the Scorch, a bleak landscape that is filled with dangerous obstacles. The Gladers partner with resistance fighters to take on WCKD in an attempt to discover their plans for the future in this young-adult dystopian thriller from 20th Century Fox. Directed by Wes Ball who previously directed the original film, The Maze Runner. Cast includes Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Giancarlo Esposito, Aidan Gillen, Ki Hong Lee, Barry Pepper, Lili Taylor and Patricia Clarkson(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: After an exploratory mission goes awry, lone astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is left for dead on the hostile surface of Mars and must use his scientific ingenuity to homestead an enclosed habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, the astronauts he left behind realize the severity of his plight and join forces with an international coalition of scientists to launch a rescue mission in defiance of NASA protocol(n)

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A young stud who is going nowhere fast in small-town Texas heads for New York in this classic downbeat drama which took the Oscar for best picture. On the sleazy streets of the Big Apple, Joe Buck's dreams of finding glamour and adventure are shattered by a succession of unsavoury incidents, but he finds a friend in the unlikely shape of 'Ratso' Rizzo, a street hustler with a wasting lung disease(n)

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A group of death row prison guards discover there's more to an unusual new inmate than meets the eye(n)

programme.title: From Hell
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars in this intense psychological spin on the horrific legend of Jack the Ripper(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Where My Country Gone?. Mr Garrison is fed up with undocumented immigrants, and proposes building a wall to keep them out(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Douche and Turd. Anarkistisessa animaatiosarjassa seurataan neljän 8-vuotiaan pojan elämää Coloradon takamailla sijaitevassa South Parkissa. Pikkukaupunkiin mahtuu jos jonkinlaista asukasta talk show'ta pitävästä Jeesuksesta sikiöpäiseen kouluterveydenhoitajaan eivätkä kaupungintalolle laskeutuvat avarusolennotkaan ole kovin ihmeellisiä. Kylen, Stanin, Kennyn ja Cartmanin näkökulmasta kaikki asiat näyttäytyvät ihastuttavan rehellisesti ja raadollisesti(n)

programme.title: South Park

programme.title: Joe Dirt
programme.desc: In this comedy from the producing team behind Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo, David Spade portrays Joe Dirt, a janitor with a mullet hairdo who currently works as a janitor in the rural West Coast. An on-air radio deejay (Dennis Miller) recounts his life story as a white-trash reject who, at age eight, was abandoned by his mean-spirited birth parents (Roseanne and Gary Busey) at the Grand Canyon. Years later, Joe Dirt attempts to seek out his birth parents and discover the mystery of why they dismissed him. Going from one misadventure to another, Joe's life unfolds on the radio show where his life story becomes a sensation to the locals. Joe Dirt was produced by Adam Sandler's production company, Happy Madison, and features the screen debut of rock star Kid Rock in a supporting role as Joe Dirt's rival(n)

programme.desc: Tiff Needell offers his opinion on the Lamborghini Gallardo Performante in Nice, and Jonny Smith drives Volkswagen's revamped Phaeton, testing the car's voice recognition system at 100mph. Jason Plato takes the Porsche Cayman R around Rockingham circuit in Northamptonshire, and the team presents a guide to frugal motoring, offering advice on economical vehicles and models that are the least prone to depreciation.(n)

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The team celebrates the programme's 10th anniversary by showing some of the show's most memorable moments. Tiff Needell recalls actor John Barrowman's accident in a rally car worth more than £100,000, and Jason Plato reflects on his ride in a Ferrari with Girls Aloud singer Sarah Harding in the driver's seat. Jonny Smith also takes to the Isle of Man TT circuit in a three-wheeled scooter, and there is a race between the BMW M3 GTS and Porsche 911 GT3 RS.(n)

programme.title: What Could Possibly Go Wrong
programme.desc: Kevin Moore and Grant Reynolds try to make a motorised skateboard faster using a batch of home-made rocket fuel.(n)

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Did the legendary flying guillotine exist - and is it really possible to decapitate a man and catch his head? Plus, Jamie gets fired up over a military myth.(n)

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Kari, Grant and Tory try to patch up a damaged plane using only duct tape, while Jamie Hyneman investigates a viral video of excavators rowing a barge.(n)

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: An emaciated horse gives birth prematurely, and the foal is so weak Dr Thurston takes it home to bottle feed.(n)

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Adam Savage and Jamie Hyneman investigate whether igniting a sewer drain full of combustible gas would turn a manhole cover into a missile.(n)

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Adam Savage, Jamie Hyneman and the build team spin the Wheel of Mythfortune to select five random letters and e-mails from viewers to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Spring brings new challenges for the off-gridders as they scramble to repair their cabins, while the freight team prepares its most dangerous load of the year.(n)

programme.title: Man-Eating Super Snake
programme.desc: Authorities in southern Florida battle to control the growing numbers of African rock pythons, lethal giant constrictors known to attack, kill and even devour humans.(n)

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.sub-title: There's An Ass For Every Seat.
programme.desc: Dave Kindig and the team repair a 1953 Ford pickup, where a flesh wound has made a mess, and a 1969 Chevrolet Camaro, which needs new suspension. Plus, they look at a 1965 Pontiac.(n)

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A skipper comes to regret instructing his crew to go outside in savage weather to save the ship.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: When a couple fail to turn up at the airport for a flight to Italy and their dog is found brutally killed in what appears to be a burglary at their home, suspicion falls on their son, who holds a grudge against his father for turning him in for possession of a class A drug. A neighbour produces mobile phone footage of the family car being torched by teenagers, one of whom is known to the police, and the case takes an unexpected twist when the Sun Hill team starts tracking the missing persons' bank account. Former EastEnders actor Stuart Laing (Rob Minter) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Kirsty calls for help when a woman is found unconscious and with multiple injuries beneath an open window. Callum eventually responds, having just learned of his father's death, but as the investigation slowly uncovers the activities and relationships of the residents of the house, the sergeant's distracted behaviour leads to a furious outburst against his colleague witnessed by Inspector Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Callum returns to work, determined to uncover the truth about the rape allegation that blackened his dead father's name as a police officer and divided the family for 20 years. Kirsty is shocked by the sergeant's brusque attitude in handling a vulnerable witness, and Smithy eventually realises his troubled colleague will stop at nothing to get a result against a knife-wielding blackmailer. Guest starring Lesley Vickerage (The Inspector Lynley Mysteries) and David Schofield (Pirates of the Caribbean).(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: In the first of a two-part series finale, a 14-year-old dies in Smithy's arms following a stabbing incident, and CCTV footage reveals he had been acting as a `mule' for the older members of a gang. One of Mickey's informants is spotted at the crime scene and eventually gives vital evidence pointing to the most likely culprit, but the detective fears for her safety when she is released on bail and returns to the estate.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Sister Julienne receives an SOS from Holloway Prison, whose usual maternity workers have been struck down by illness, and when she and Trixie step in to help, the nun puts her reputation on the line to prevent a heavily pregnant convict having her unborn baby taken away by social services. Shelagh faces heartache when a routine pregnancy check reveals something far more serious, Alec has a confession for Jenny, and Fred takes the gang to the theatre to celebrate Chummy's birthday - only for the trip to end in disaster. Lacey Turner, best known as EastEnders' Stacey Branning, guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Jenny has an eventful few days, starting with a patient who as well as having herself to worry about, is also struggling to cope with her mother, an agoraphobic who hasn't been outside for at least 12 years. On top of that, Alec asks the midwife to accompany him to Brighton for the weekend, leaving her wondering if his intentions are strictly honourable. However, things soon take a tragic turn. Meanwhile, Shelagh joins the local choir to take her mind off her problems. Jessica Raine, Leo Staar and Laura Main star.(n)

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: The nuns and midwives are busy preparing for Sister Evangelina's surprise jubilee celebrations, marking 50 years since she took her vows, but a face from the past threatens to ruin the party for the guest of honour. It's back to business when a young woman with Down's syndrome is brought in feeling unwell. To everyone's surprise, they discover she is six months pregnant, causing some of them to think the worst, and the staff are joined by new nurse Patsy, whose sense of humour and no-nonsense attitude make her an instant hit.(n)

programme.title: Catherine Cookson's The Tide of Life
programme.desc: While her father is away, a woman is content with her position as a housekeeper - until a death throws her life into turmoil. Feature-length period drama, starring Gillian Kearney, John Bowler, Ray Stevenson and Susie Burton.(n)

programme.title: The Musketeers
programme.desc: A drunken Athos takes a woman hostage in the town square and his friends are shocked to discover it is none other than Milady - but when it turns out that d'Artagnan knows her, a rift develops between the Musketeers that threatens to tear them apart, giving the Cardinal and his spy the ammunition they need to finally wreak their deadly revenge against the king's soldiers. But as Milady revisits her dark past, she puts Constance in danger - can the Musketeers re-band in time to bring Milady and Richelieu to justice?.(n)

programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries
programme.desc: The sudden death of a bicycle racer leaves Dr Grace struggling to determine the cause. With Julia's assistance, she performs her first brain bisection in her quest for the truth. However, just as she appears to be getting close to reaching a conclusion, the discovery of an injection mark on the victim's arm seems to contradict her findings. Drama, starring Georgina Reilly, Helene Joy and Yannick Bisson star.(n)

programme.title: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
programme.desc: Lucien investigates when one of Ballarat's most prominent surgeons is found dead on his own operating table, and ends up being drawn into a web of jealousy and sexual intrigue. Meanwhile, as Chief Superintendent Munro's enmity towards the doctor continues, an old ally returns from Melbourne. Australian detective drama, starring Craig McLachlan.(n)

programme.title: Silent Witness
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. Amanda Burton's last appearance as forensic pathologist Professor Sam Ryan. When the bodies of two men are exposed by a landslide in Ireland, the subsequent investigation suggests the pair died in the sectarian violence of the 1970s, prompting Sam to make a long overdue and painful journey home. Bryan Murray, William Gaminara and Tom Ward also star.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: The chance discovery of a cache of explosives plunges Jim headlong into another multiple murder investigation. As the death toll mounts, he finds his hardest job is establishing a motive - there may be an Irish connection, or a sinister criminal mastermind could be responsible. Mark McManus stars as the Caledonian copper, with James Macpherson and Iain Anders.(n)

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: Trapped on the plateau, Edward, Agnes and Lord Roxton set out in search of professors Challenger and Summerlee, following their capture by the strange apemen who may provide the missing link between modern man and prehistoric life. But when they mount a rescue, the explorers are confronted by a tribe of Indians. Conclusion of the adventure, starring Bob Hoskins, Peter Falk and James Fox.(n)

programme.title: Ain't Misbehavin
programme.desc: Comedy drama set in the 1940s big-band scene, starring Robson Green and Jerome Flynn. A man's dream of fighting for his country are ended by a plane crash, leading him to fall back on his musical skills. But an unfortunate encounter with a petty criminal draws him into the black-market underworld of gang warfare - and an affair with a society beauty. Julia Sawalha, Warren Mitchell, Jane Lapotaire and Jim Carter co-star.(n)

programme.title: Dangerfield
programme.desc: Jonathan investigates the death of a local artist, whom he suspects was hiding a guilty secret - and matters are complicated further by his growing friendship with the art critic who found the body. Starring Nigel Havers, Lynsey Baxter and Haydn Gwynne.(n)

programme.title: Pie in the Sky

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part series finale, bringing to an end Britain's longest-running police procedural drama, which has been broadcast in 55 countries. The show, which began life as one-off drama Woodentop in 1984, broke new ground by exploring the lives and loves of the officers of the fictional London station of Sun Hill. Callum finally proves himself to Smithy as they hunt the members of the Parkway Crew responsible for the death of Liam Martin, and Mickey goes all-out to get justice for his informant Jasmine Harris following the gang rape.(n)

programme.title: The Bill
programme.sub-title: Funny Ol' Business - Cops and Robbers.
programme.desc: The very first episode of the police drama series set in London's Sun Hill station. After a briefing from Sgt Cryer, PCs Carver and Edwards arrest a car thief, but are reluctantly persuaded to release him when he turns out to be an informant for DS Burnside from Barton Street. PC Litten assists CID with a case involving a series of house break-ins related to a double-glazing company, while WPCs Ackland and Martella make a failed attempt to arrest a gang of pickpockets.(n)

programme.title: Hetty Wainthropp Investigates
programme.desc: Now that Hetty and her husband are back from their trip to Australia, the Wainthropp Detective Agency can get back to some serious sleuthing. However, the first case to crop up is far from typical - it involves hunting for buried treasure in the wilds of Cumbria. Patricia Routledge stars as the modern-day Miss Marple, with Derek Benfield, Dominic Monaghan and Lesley Dunlop.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: Sandra and the team investigate why five years earlier a man seemingly vanished during his morning run and has not been seen since. The alarm was raised when he never made it to work at the construction company belonging to his father-in-law, who has a history of violence, and the detectives' suspicions grow when they realise how much the missing man's wife is scared of her dad. Could he have had something to do with his son-in-law's disappearance? Amanda Redman, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Denis Lawson and Dennis Waterman star.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Lynley Mysteries
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. The detective struggles to cope following the death of his wife and suffers more grief when the body of his godson is discovered in a bricked-up drain 12 years after he went missing. Lynley himself becomes a suspect when the boy's sister is found dead, forcing him to enlist the help of his lawyer and DS McCaffrey's son to prove his innocence. Crime drama, starring Nathaniel Parker, Sharon Small and Nicholas Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Can Wait
programme.desc: Kevin learns that his childhood enemy is trying to reserve the church for his daughter's marriage, on the same day that Kendra wants it for her wedding. Comedy, with Kevin James.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly reignites a long-standing feud after she invites Murray's unreliable brother to visit at Thanksgiving. Meanwhile, Adam upsets the balance of power between him and Barry after he wins a ball game between them for the first time. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Erica's new job at the department store is put in jeopardy when Beverly takes advantage of her daughter's employee discount too frequently. Meanwhile, during a trip to the horse racing track, Pops bends the truth to convince Barry that his bad luck has changed for the better. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Beverly and Murray fall out over Barry's plan to perform his martial arts routine at the annual high school talent show. Pops buys Erica an electric guitar, urging her to take to the stage and sing. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is caught in a battle of wills between Sheldon and Penny, while Leonard tries to reignite his long-distance relationship with Priya, who has moved back to India. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard inadvertently gives the impression he is attracted to Amy when he accompanies her to a colleague's wedding. Meanwhile, Howard tries to persuade Bernadette they should live with his mother after getting married and suggests a trial run of the arrangement over the weekend.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Raj feels upset about not being in a relationship, so Penny sets out to find a date and introduces him to a girl he can actually talk to. They hit it off, but when it becomes apparent he has been buying her expensive gifts, his friends suspect she is only interested in his wealth.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's old adversary Wil Wheaton returns and invites everyone to a house-warming party. Leonard is eager to go, but Sheldon threatens to shun him if he attends. However, he soon changes his mind when he finds out that Star Trek: The Next Generation actor Brent Spiner will also be there.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon's mother comes to visit and woos the gang, but he cannot help feeling jealous of all the attention she is receiving - until a bout of illness lays him low, and he suddenly sees the benefits of having her around. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon hires an attractive female assistant, but when she becomes interested in Leonard, Penny decides to mark her territory by sleeping with him. Meanwhile, Howard starts to lose his mind when his return from space is delayed another week. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is not pleased when his assistant Alex starts flirting with Leonard and has a word with her about it. Unfortunately, his comments are so inappropriate that he is accused of sexual harassment and sent to the university's human resources department, where he ends up dragging Leonard, Raj and Howard into trouble too. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon learns of a machine that will help him understand human emotions. Penny tries to help her brother get a job, and Raj asks his ex-girlfriends why he is still single.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: A teenager falls in love with a new girl in his school, only to discover she is a witch. As dark secrets from her family's past emerge, they discover that on her 16th birthday, she will be required to choose a side in a conflict between good and evil. Fantasy based on Kami Garcia's novel, starring Alden Ehrenreich, Alice Englert, Jeremy Irons and Emma Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Australian-born Adam plans an `80s Aussie soap' wedding in South Shields, despite the wishes of his fiancee Rachel, who dreams of a classy, sophisticated ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Tattoo Fixers on Holiday
programme.desc: Glen helps family man Kieren clean away a reminder of a holiday conquest, and Alice meets Jenny, who aims to get a very special tribute to her organ donor.(n)

programme.title: Body Fixers
programme.desc: New series. Experts work on various body issues, tackling a secret complex for Celebrity Big Brother winner Stephen Bear, a bump on a woman's nose and a man's outrageous comb-over.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox

programme.title: Rude Tube

programme.title: Rude Tube

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Omnibus. Cindy is alarmed over news of Armstrong, and Dirk has a plan. Zack feels under pressure, while Hunter and Neeta's day out is ruined. Meanwhile, Luke covers for Darren.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Maxine plans a dinner party for the family but things quickly turn chaotic, and Neeta is made to feel guilty by Mac, and later she gives Hunter some devastating news.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The coach returns to Split on the Croatian coast, where a visit to a romantic waterfall leads to some serious flirting.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Binky is in turmoil when ex-boyfriend JP begins making overtures to win her back, while Proudlock persuades Jamie to make up with Alex after their falling out in France.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe gets a new job as the lifestyle correspondent on a local morning TV show, but is required to get up very early every day, which puts a strain on his relationship with Mel. Lennox and Zander have creative differences as they continue to shoot their short film. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre's childhood friend Sha comes to stay with the Johnsons for a couple of days, but Rainbow thinks he is taking advantage of her husband's generosity.(n)

programme.title: Black-ish
programme.desc: Dre worries that Christmas has become too commercialised, so Pops comes up with a plan involving fewer presents and more family time.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy

programme.title: Baby Daddy

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily and Marshall grow tired of Ted's intrusions on their privacy and decide to find a new flat - but are unable to settle on something they both feel is suitable. Comedy, starring Jason Segel, Alyson Hannigan and Josh Radnor.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted is delighted with a woman he is seeing, until he introduces her to his friends, who reveal she has an irritating habit - which then becomes the only thing he notices about her. Infuriated, he decides to get even by pointing out the things he finds annoying about them. Meanwhile, Marshall anxiously awaits the results of his bar exam.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Adam breaks his arm and tells his school friends he fell off a hoverboard like the hero in Back to the Future, but the lie threatens his friendship with Emmy Mirsky. Meanwhile, Beverly fears she's being replaced in the kitchen when the family falls in love with the new Chinese restaurant in town. An 11-year old boy captures his family on his video camera as they grow up in the 1980s. Comedy, starring Wendi McLendon-Covey and Jeff Garlin.(n)

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.sub-title: The Most Handsome Boy on the Planet.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While being interviewed for a documentary about Star Trek character Mr Spock, Sheldon struggles to suppress his emotions about his recent break-up with Amy, leaving Leonard and Penny shocked to discover he had bought her an engagement ring. Howard and Bernadette fall out over plans to renovate his childhood home. Wil Wheaton, Adam Nimoy and Stephen Merchant guest star.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy has a date with a mystery man, so Sheldon asks Howard and Raj to help him find a new girlfriend online. When Amy is coy with the details about the guy she's dating, Penny and Bernadette decide to spy on them. Stephen Merchant guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe fears that being a nanny will prevent him from having a love life, so a worried Mel lies to get him a date with her former sorority sister. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel disapproves of a boy Lennox has started dating, despite seeing `a bad boy' herself. Meanwhile, Joe takes it upon himself to tidy his employer's closet. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: The guys appreciate Bonnie's help, but struggle to cope when she begins to turn up at the flat unexpectedly. Ben and Danny decide to take baby Emma over to Riley's place, but end up sabotaging her latest date. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted--or rather, refereed--by boxing expert Max Kellerman, this lively cable-TV discussion show featured four sports columnists, each from a different part of the USA, discussing recent pro-athletic developments in a sort of electronic summit meeting. Kellerman determined how much time each of the columnists would be permitted to express his or her opinions--and he was harsh indeed, frequently limiting the discourse to ten seconds or less. At the end of the show, Kellerman would award points for the most cogent opinions and arguments, and also subtract points from contributors whom he determined had not effectively expressed themselves. The inagural episode of ESPN's Around the Horn was seen on September 30, 2002(n)

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: Tony Kornheiser and Mike Wilbon face off in this half-hour debate. The journalists take two minutes to argue each point, and haggle their way through a variety of sports news(n)

programme.title: SportsNation
programme.desc: ESPN Radio personality Colin Cowherd and Michelle Beadle host this sports talk show that's powered by the fans. The topics covered in this weekday show are chosen by fans voting on ESPN.com's SportsNation site(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: David Attenborough reports on the problems facing the Indian tiger, and how special reserves set up to preserve the species have become a popular target for poachers, with officials turning a blind eye to their activities. Scientist-turned-whistleblower Raghu Chundawat discusses how he faced criminal charges when he tried to expose the problem, and considers what can be done to save the species from extinction.(n)

programme.title: Walrus: Two Tonne Tusker
programme.desc: Reproduction scientist Holley explores walruses' breeding grounds in Northern Alaska in an effort to help captive pacific walrus Sivuqaq become a parent.(n)

programme.title: Killer Whales - Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: A look at research into the lives of the marine mammals, including insights into the creatures' intelligence, social interactions and parental instincts.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: David Attenborough narrates Brad Bestelink's documentary, which was filmed over the course of 18 months and follows a female leopard and its two cubs living in the wilds of Botswana alongside less-than-friendly lions, wild dogs and hyenas. The competition for food is tough, and the cats have to learn the new skill of fishing if they are to have any chance of survival.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Natural World: Honey Badgers - Masters of Mayhem.
programme.desc: Although barely a foot tall, the honey badger has a reputation as one of the most fearless animals in the world, attacking just about anything from venomous snakes to adult lions. This documentary follows a scientist, a beekeeper and a conservationist in South Africa as they set out to discover if the creature is really as fearsome as it is made out to be.(n)

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Meerkats: Secrets of an Animal Superstar.
programme.desc: Meerkat pups Squirt and Weeny belong to one of the most famous animal families on the planet and are also part of a 20-year animal behaviour study. David Attenborough narrates the full story of the research, from the early days when it was a challenge to even get close to a meerkat to the latest revelations about these animals and their complex lives.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: Documentary offering an insight into the lives and behaviour of the planet's fastest creatures.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The crew embarks on a journey through the Mediterranean Sea, whose coasts are among the most densely populated in the world, to explore the profound effect man has had on the body of water. Paul Rose and the team also visit the remains of a Roman shipwreck and, under the cover of night, dive the Straits of Messina, hoping to find and film the sixgill shark - one of the largest predatory sharks in the world.(n)

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Alice Roberts examines the latest discoveries from the northern hemisphere to shed light on the lives and habitats of the creatures that dominated the planet 40,000 years ago. She begins by heading to North America, which was home to a diverse group of giant mammals, and discovers how the sabre-toothed cat's out-sized teeth were vital for hunting, yet easily broken. Alice looks at evidence of the bear-sized Shasta ground sloth in a cave in the Grand Canyon, and learns about the strange armadillo-like glyptodont - which was the size of a small car.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: In the waters off the coast of Borneo, Steve Backshall comes face to face with a venomous scorpion fish and witnesses the spear-mantis impaling its supper.(n)

programme.title: Deadly 60
programme.desc: Steve Backshall searches for lethal wildlife in the UK, and has a diving competition with gannets at sea. He also meets the only species of snake to have hospitalised him, studies a nest of hornets and is hunted through a forest by a goshawk.(n)

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: An exploration of the survival techniques used by creatures inhabiting the deep oceans of the world, where adaptation is paramount for those dwelling on the surface as well as below. Pods of dolphins are filmed charging in search of prey, surprising methods for conserving energy are revealed as deep-sea octopuses `fly' with wings, and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colourful display.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The crew embarks on a journey through the Mediterranean Sea, whose coasts are among the most densely populated in the world, to explore the profound effect man has had on the body of water. Paul Rose and the team also visit the remains of a Roman shipwreck and, under the cover of night, dive the Straits of Messina, hoping to find and film the sixgill shark - one of the largest predatory sharks in the world.(n)

programme.title: Hunters of the South Seas
programme.desc: Writer and explorer Will Millard heads to the Indonesian village of Lamalera, which is one of the Coral Triangle's most notorious communities as the inhabitants have survived for centuries by hunting manta rays, dolphins, sharks and whales. Using hand-thrown harpoons, the fisherman are the last people on earth who continue to hunt whales in this traditional manner and Will goes out to sea with them to witness their hunts first-hand, testing his Western values to the limit.(n)

programme.title: Tornado Alley
programme.desc: Documentary featuring amateur videos, news reports and police dashboard footage of a tornado and its destruction in Moore, Oklahoma.(n)

programme.title: Thunderball
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond is dispatched to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by international terrorist organisation SPECTRE. Action(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: An ageless monk guards a sacred scroll that can grant its readers the power to rule the world. With the help of a cocky pickpocket, the monk battles a Nazi who's trying to seize control of the artifact(n)

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Futuristic action drama in which highway cops battle predatory motorcyclists(n)

programme.title: Patriot Games
programme.desc: Adaptation of Tom Clancy's novel, with ex-CIA agent Jack Ryan and his family the targets of a terrorist(n)

programme.title: My Darling Clementine
programme.desc: John Ford's western takes its inspiration from the life and legend of Wyatt Earp (Henry Fonda), the frontier lawman who teamed with Doc Holliday (Victor Mature) for the famous gunfight at the O.K. Corral(n)

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Johnny, who has just been released from prison and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a loner but Johnny is determined that their romance will blossom(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A woman realizes that friends can be lovers, but now has to convince the friend in question in this romantic comedy. Michael O'Neal (Dermot Mulroney) and Julianne Potter (Julia Roberts) were romantically involved in college, and after breaking up, they have managed to remain close friends. For years, Julianne and Michael have had a pledge that if both were single when they turned 28, they would get married. Shortly before her 28th birthday, Julianne is lamenting the sad state of her love life when she gets a call from Michael, who announces that he has important news. Julianne is convinced that Michael is going to ask her to marry him, and she is crestfallen when he announces that he's engaged to Kimmy Wallace (Cameron Diaz). Kimmy seems like the perfect woman for Michael; she's sweet, pretty, bright, and adores Michael, and her wealthy family is just as fond of him as she is. But now that Julianne has realized how much she loves Michael, she's not about to give him up without a fight -- and isn't afraid to fight dirty. Julianne's uneasy ally in the battle for Michael's affections is her friend and editor George Downes (Rupert Everett), a cheerfully out-of-the-closet homosexual who is not prepared when Julianne asks him to pose as her boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Thunderball
programme.desc: British secret agent James Bond is dispatched to the Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by international terrorist organisation SPECTRE. Action(n)

programme.title: Mad Max
programme.desc: Futuristic action drama in which highway cops battle predatory motorcyclists(n)

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: Shelley is living a carefree life until a rival gets her tossed out of the Playboy Mansion. With nowhere to go, fate delivers her to the sorority girls from Zeta Alpha Zeta. Unless they can sign a new pledge class, the seven socially clueless women will lose their house to the scheming girls of Phi Iota Mu. In order to accomplish their goal, they need Shelley to teach them the ways of makeup and men at the same time, Shelley needs some of what the Zetas have: a sense of individuality. The combination leads all the girls to learn how to stop pretending and start being themselves(n)

programme.title: The Living Daylights
programme.desc: In this instalment of the James Bond series, Agent 007 is assigned to protect a Russian defector from the KGB. When the defection proves to be an elaborate ploy, Bond woos her anyway, and together they follow a trail to a crooked American arms dealer supplying weapons to Afghanistan(n)

programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Night of the Crash. In the Season 3 premiere, the clan deals with the loss of a family member(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Ritual. In the aftermath of the tragedy, the Calloways and Vaughns comfort one another(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Big-budget remake of the 1968 sci-fi classic following the adventures of a daring astronaut who crash-lands on a planet dominated by intelligent, talking apes. With the help of a chimpanzee activist and a growing band of rebel humans, he forms a resistance movement to liberate mankind from their simian oppressors(n)

programme.title: Stick
programme.desc: Based on a novel by Elmore Leonard, this crime drama centers on a vengeful ex-con (Burt Reynolds, who also directed) as he searches for the drug lords who killed his partner while trying to start anew in Miami(n)

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: Cut-rate sword-and-sorcery spectacle set against the fall of the Roman Empire, following the 12-year-old emperor and his epic battle against a ruthless warlord. Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai, Peter Mullan, Kevin McKidd. Directed by Doug Lefler(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: A retired Special Forces colonel storms the South American stronghold of terrorists who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into deposing a Latin dictator(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: Sean Connery, Donald Sutherland and Lesley-Anne Down star in this true-life action thriller, based on director/screenwriter Michael Crichton's best-selling novel, about a daring gold heist that shocked Victorian society(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: The film is about an orphaned science whiz who invents a device to recover lost memories and is whisked into the future in a time-traveling space machine(n)

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: Cut-rate sword-and-sorcery spectacle set against the fall of the Roman Empire, following the 12-year-old emperor and his epic battle against a ruthless warlord. Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai, Peter Mullan, Kevin McKidd. Directed by Doug Lefler(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne and Richard Widmark star in this historical film spectacular about the attack by Mexican troops on the Alamo(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: A retired Special Forces colonel storms the South American stronghold of terrorists who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into deposing a Latin dictator(n)

programme.title: Wyatt Earp's Revenge
programme.desc: Wyatt Earp assembles a posse to track down the men responsible for murdering his wife(n)

programme.title: The Great Train Robbery
programme.desc: Sean Connery, Donald Sutherland and Lesley-Anne Down star in this true-life action thriller, based on director/screenwriter Michael Crichton's best-selling novel, about a daring gold heist that shocked Victorian society(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: John Wayne and Richard Widmark star in this historical film spectacular about the attack by Mexican troops on the Alamo(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: This sequel to Speed sees Sandra Bullock back and Jan de Be Bont directing but with Jason Patric taking over the Keanu Reeves role. The pair are an item and decide on a romantic cruise to the Caribbean. Unfortunately, also aboard the cruise liner are a gathering of diamond merchants, complete with their wares and arch-villain Willem Defoe, who plans to steal their merchandise. Unlike the original Speed, where the trick was that the bus would explode if it slowed down, this time, speed is of the essence - the plan is to ram the ship into dry land and, in the mayhem, escape with the loot. Bullock and Patric are perfect as the dynamic duo who save the day and the ocean-going scenario allows for more spectacular special effects than the original(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Two siblings find themselves competing on and off the racetrack in this action-packed drama. K.C. Carlyle (Steve Howey) and his kid brother, Trip (Mike Vogel), are both racers in the rough and tumble world of supercross, a revved-up variation on motocross racing in which specially modified motorcycle negotiate specially built dirt tracks that send riders through tricky twists and turns, over rough terrain, and off high-flying jumps. Both are talented racers, but K.C. has a wilder and more reckless approach, while Trip follows a more cautious path. A more profound difference between them arises when K.C. is offered a lucrative deal to ride for a factory-sponsored team; he takes the deal, and leaves his brother behind to race on his own dime. However, when an accident takes Trip out of the running on the supercross circuit, he and K.C. set aside their differences as Trip helps coach his older brother so he can succeed in his drive to the championship. Made with the cooperation of a leading supercross race promoter, Supercross: The Movie also stars Sophia Bush and Cameron Richardson as the brothers' love interests, and Robert Carradine as a determined race coach(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Best of the Best 3: No Turning Back
programme.desc: The action series continues, as Tommy Lee takes on a group of neo-Nazis in the American heartland(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A low-level CIA worker returns from lunch to find all his colleagues have been assassinated and goes on the run as he tries to discover who ordered the killings. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Director Stephen Chow made his name in this country with the deliriously wonderful Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle continues his love of comedy kung-fu films. Set in pre-revolutionary China, Chow plays Sing, a street hustler who makes the mistake of pretending to be a member of the notorious Axe gang. He becomes caught up in a war between the gang and the residents of Pig Sty Alley, which the gang want to take over. Little do they know that two of the Alley's residents are retired martial arts experts and soon the fists and feet are flying in knockabout fights that owe as much to Kill Bill (some of the wire work is done by Yuen Wo Ping, who worked on Tarantino's film) as they do to classic Hollywood silent comedies. Film fans can enjoy Chow's references to films ranging from Top Hat to The Shining while the rest can just enjoy a wildly entertaining romp. In Cantonese with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The concluding instalment of a two-part crossover with the original NCIS series sees Sebastian joining Abby Sciuto in Washington, DC to pick through the forensic evidence relating to the aircraft murders. Meanwhile, DC agent Ellie Bishop heads to New Orleans to help Pride and his team track down the chief suspect - Abby's brother Luca. Naval crime drama, guest starring Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team suspects foul play when a seaman who was set to testify before a grand jury dies before he can make his court appearance. When it becomes clear the man was murdered, the subsequent investigation reveals that a previously thwarted human-trafficking ring has been re-established. Meanwhile, a storm causes a massive power outage, and McGee seeks a room for the night among his colleagues. Naval crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A deep-sea diver is murdered on the job, and his co-workers all become suspects. However, when they return to the surface, they must remain in a high-tech decompression chamber for four days. With each of their suspects confined within a tank, the NCIS team must complete an unorthodox investigation from the outside. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the Secretary of the Navy, learns her daughter has been kidnapped, and the NCIS crew teams up with the FBI to track the case, determine a motive and bring the abducted girl home. Meanwhile, McGee's childhood friend, NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page, arrives in town to assist with advanced tactics training. Naval crime drama, guest starring Leslie Hope and Christina Chang.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team looks into a raid on a naval base, and Dr Cyril Taft - the surgeon who saved Gibbs' life - experiences the thrill of assisting on an investigation. Assigned to treat Gibbs' suspect, Taft manages to uncover evidence that may prove crucial to solving the case. Meanwhile, DiNozzo pays his old flame Jeanne Benoit a visit as he chases a lead involving doctors in Sudan. Guest starring John Cryer and Scottie Thompson.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: After David shoots an unarmed murder suspect, investigator Sharon Raydor is brought in to carry out an internal inquiry and Brenda soon finds herself at odds with the newcomer. Detective drama, starring Corey Reynolds and Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and her squad are seconded into the FBI when a missing persons case turns into a murder investigation involving drug trafficking at parties, giving the deputy chief and Fritz the chance to work together again. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The team faces a difficult task when it investigates the murder of a reformed gang member. The people of the neighbourhood are sceptical and wary of the officers' presence, despite the fact that solving the crime could bring the inhabitants together. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and her team investigate the death of an internet dating legend and find appearances are deceptive when a new officer shows up, while Pope tries to integrate himself into the squad.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A major shootout results in the deaths of two patrol cops and an 18-year-old youth. Brenda's investigation is made all the more difficult by the involvement of Captain Sharon Raydor of the Force Investigation Division, and the two soon find themselves at odds. Mary McDonnell guest stars, with Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The consultant's ex-wife Isabella Colon faces a wrongful death lawsuit, and Bull's efforts to help are hindered by unresolved issues from their marriage.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Torres discovers a witness in an NCIS case is wanted by US Immigration and Customs Enforcement, while Abby, Bishop and McGee hope to sublet Tony's apartment - by wooing his father.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Ellie is sent to Gitmo to gather evidence in the case relating to the murder of a US Navy chaplain, and while there, she is given cause to question her previous work at the NSA.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Mayor West marries Lois's sister and the pair move into the Griffin family home, where he becomes Peter's best friend. However, not everyone welcomes the new arrivals, and Stewie takes over Chris's room after being evicted from his own.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Bertram goes back in time to kill Leonardo da Vinci - forcing Stewie and Brian to give chase. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein, with Wallace Shawn (Toy Story).(n)

programme.title: Baskets
programme.desc: Christine hosts a yard sale to get rid of some of her mother's belongings, and Chip meets Trinity again and tries to help her find a job.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The New Adventures of Old Tom.
programme.desc: Lois and her friends take a shine to hunky reporter Dallas, who looks set to replace Tom Tucker as news anchor, Brian pretends to be a millionaire to impress a new love interest.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.sub-title: The Life and Times of Stan Smith.
programme.desc: Stan becomes addicted to `dying' after Roger tricks him into thinking he has had a heart attack. Meanwhile, Klaus takes Steve to Arizona State University for a college visit.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Stewie, Chris and Brian's Excellent Adventure.
programme.desc: Stewie and Brian use their time machine to help Chris pass his history test so he does not have to re-sit the whole year, but trouble ensues when the trio all get stuck in the past.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan saves Roger's life, but the pair disagree over the chain of events leading to the rescue, resulting in the alien attempting to make a fresh start. Meanwhile, Steve becomes power-hungry when he is given the job of making announcements over the school's PA system.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan tries to prove he is the alpha male at the Smith house when Steve challenges him for family dominance, while Hayley and Jeff seek marriage counselling after their honeymoon period wears off.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie and Chris go missing, prompting Lois to ask a psychic for help - but the family's obsession with the paranormal goes too far. Meanwhile, Chris develops a crush on a girl at school.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie auditions in drag for his favourite TV show after discovering it is only searching for girls, and soon becomes a hit with viewers. Meg shocks the entire city by dating a conventionally attractive boy.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan begins playing golf with Senator Buckingham in a bid to advance in the CIA, but Roger accidentally sells the politician's daughter to a drug lord, which leaves Stan having to choose between his family and his career.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger bets Klaus that he can make Steve popular at school, but none of his plans seem to work - until the high school's in-crowd realise Steve can be their designated driver. Meanwhile, Stan and Francine play pranks on each other.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter decides to become a member of the paparazzi, but falls out with his boss at the brewery over her inappropriate behaviour and ends up getting fired. Meanwhile, Stewie appears in a play but suffers stage fright.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois encourages Brian to submit a script for a TV pilot, but things do not go according to plan once James Woods (as himself) gets involved. Meanwhile, Stewie has a mishap. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Elijah Wood and Charlie Sheen.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger realises he has a crush on Hayley while Jeff is away, and Stan decides to sell his SUV himself rather than trade it in for lower than his asking price. Comedy about a man who works for the CIA.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan goes on holiday, but while he is away Bullock gives him an assignment. Elsewhere, Hayley and Jeff try to rekindle their sex life, Roger poses as an elderly female widow and Steve goes on a mission to find nudity.(n)

programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Can't See a Thing.
programme.desc: A mystery assailant throws solvent in Adrian's eyes, temporarily blinding him - but he is still able to use his remaining senses to investigate the murder of an elderly fireman. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes Back to School.
programme.desc: Adrian is called in to investigate a suspicious death at a school, and works as a substitute teacher in a bid to discover the truth - but finds that academic life has changed since he was a boy. Guest starring Andrew McCarthy and David Rasche, with Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: A sky-diver dies in perplexing circumstances in Mexico, prompting the local mayor to ask Adrian to investigate - but he finds it difficult to concentrate on the case. Tony Shalhoub stars.(n)

programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Goes to the Circus.
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer suspects a circus animal trainer is responsible for the murder of an unpopular ringmaster - but Adrian focuses his investigation on the victim's ex-wife, a trapeze artist who is also a sharpshooter. Detective drama, starring Tony Shalhoub.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team investigate the death of a man who was the prime suspect in the murder of two girls 10 years earlier, prompting a detective to come out of retirement to help with the case. Crime drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A day spent working on a cut-and-dried case leaves the team free to spend some time away from work, and while McGee and Delilah argue over the importance of keeping shop-talk to a minimum, DiNozzo ends up boring his dinner date with crime-solving tales. However, the agents' personal plans are all interrupted as, one-by-one, they realise errors have been made in closing their latest investigation. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An American couple are attacked in Iraq, in the very same spot a group of US Special Ops snipers were ambushed six months earlier. Determined to get to the bottom of the case, Gibbs is forced to speak to Aaron Davis, the only survivor of the first assault, who is now struggling through PTSD at the Walter Reed Medical Center. The 300th episode of the military crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart the General. Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) makes the mistake of trying to protect a batch of cupcakes Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith) made for her teacher from schoolyard bully and thug in training Nelson (voice of Cartwright). Nelson gives Bart a beating, and promises more of the same; Marge (voice of Julie Kavner) suggests that Bart try to reason with the bully, while Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) tells his son that fighting dirty is the only answer. Neither strategy seems to work, so Bart turns to Grampa Simpson (voice of Castellaneta) for advice. With the help of Herman (voice of Harry Shearer), the mildly insane owner of a store specializing in military relics, Bart and Grampa organize his fellow fourth graders into an army and orchestrate an all-out water-balloon war against Nelson and his fellow bullies. "Bart the General" was first aired on February 4, 1990(n)
