programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: With this complex and intelligent political thriller, director Sydney Pollack returned to territory that he mined so well in "Three Days of the Condor" and "Havana." Nicole Kidman plays a UN worker who believes she overheard an assassination plot to eliminate a ruthless African dictator, and Sean Penn costars as the federal agent who may or may not believe her. This was the first feature film ever shot inside the United Nations' Manhattan headquarters. Catherine Keener, Earl Cameron(n)

programme.title: Turistas
programme.desc: After being stranded in the Brazilian jungle, young American backpackers are abducted and find themselves the victims of an organ-harvesting ring. Josh Duhamel ("Las Vegas") stars in this chilling shocker. Melissa George, Olivia Wilde, Desmond Askew. Directed by John Stockwell(n)

programme.title: Sugar Mountain
programme.desc: A man in desperate need of cash (Drew Roy) hatches a potentially lucrative plan with his brother (Shane Coffey) and girlfriend (Haley Webb) to fake their disappearances in the wilderness in the hope of later selling their story. But their scheme goes awry when they attract the attention of a suspicious sheriff (Cary Elwes) and a menacing hoodlum (Jason Momoa)(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Political comedy in which a prospective state governor's election prospects are jeopardised by his wayward younger brother. Expecting his mischievous sibling to be something of a liability during his campaign, the aspiring politician orders one of his aides to keep him out of the public eye - a task he does not relish(n)

programme.title: No One Lives
programme.desc: A ruthless gang kidnap a couple on the road after a violent robbery attempt, only to learn the couple harbour a sinister secret regarding a missing heiress(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: Epic historical drama documenting a legal battle over a shipload of slaves who overpowered their captors at sea and landed on the shores of America. Initially, the argument in the courts revolves around the issue of property and ownership. Gradually though, the lawyers for the defence come to understand and appreciate the humanity of the men turned into cargo by the evils of slavery(n)

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: In this appealing caper film, Brad Pitt plays Jerry, a bumbling criminal, and Julia Roberts is his girlfriend, Samantha, who desperately wants him to leave the mob. He agrees to one last job in Mexico, but his plans hit a snag when Samantha's kidnapped. James Gandolfini, Gene Hackman(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: US Marine Anthony Swofford may be a top sniper, but will he ever get to take the shot he's been trained for? Boredom and bullets in Sam Mendes' gritty Gulf War drama(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: With this complex and intelligent political thriller, director Sydney Pollack returned to territory that he mined so well in "Three Days of the Condor" and "Havana." Nicole Kidman plays a UN worker who believes she overheard an assassination plot to eliminate a ruthless African dictator, and Sean Penn costars as the federal agent who may or may not believe her. This was the first feature film ever shot inside the United Nations' Manhattan headquarters. Catherine Keener, Earl Cameron(n)

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: An FBI agent and a terrorist trade identities after they surgically swap faces(n)

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: In this appealing caper film, Brad Pitt plays Jerry, a bumbling criminal, and Julia Roberts is his girlfriend, Samantha, who desperately wants him to leave the mob. He agrees to one last job in Mexico, but his plans hit a snag when Samantha's kidnapped. James Gandolfini, Gene Hackman(n)

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Political comedy in which a prospective state governor's election prospects are jeopardised by his wayward younger brother. Expecting his mischievous sibling to be something of a liability during his campaign, the aspiring politician orders one of his aides to keep him out of the public eye - a task he does not relish(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Psychedelic road movie, adapted from Hunter S Thompson's cult novel, about a journalist and his attorney friend who drive from LA to Las Vegas on a huge drugs binge, finding paranoia and misadventure at every turn(n)

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: A married couple find their love affair with alcohol threatening to unravel their relationship when the time comes to confront their addiction head on. Charlie (Aaron Paul) and Kate (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) are a fun-loving couple, but their heavy drinking is starting to become a problem. As Kate constructs a series of elaborate lies to conceal her addiction from her co-workers, her relationship with her mother begins to deteriorate. Realizing that she needs to get sober in order to pull out of her downward spiral, she finds that Charlie is reluctant to join her, and starts to see their relationship in a new light. Meanwhile, once she gathers the courage to set the bottle aside, the real fight begins. Octavia L. Spencer, Nick Offerman, and Megan Mullally co-star(n)
Story of New York's infamous Studio 54 that attracted stars and starlets looking to party in the disco era(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal. Revealing how he changed from a once-idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage. Dir: Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Jim Sheridan (In the Name of the Father) co-scripted (with Terry George) and directed this drama about an Irish professional fighter. Filmed in Dublin(n)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Kristin Stewart and Dakota Fanning star in Floria Sigismondi's rock biopic, based on Cherie Curie's autobiographical account. It's the mid-1970s and Southern Californian teen Joan Larkin has changed her name to Joan Jett. Along with her new dark, edgy identity comes a nascent desire: to create an all-girl rock band. Joan and her aggressive manager Kim Fowley stumble across the perfect face for the band: the 15-year-old blonde bombshell Cherie Curie. The two girls become close, with Cherie's sweet melodies slickly harmonising with Joan's electrifying guitar solos to great effect. They name themselves The Runaways and, after recruiting a lead guitarist and a bass player, are soon signed to Mercury Records, plunging them into the deep end of 70s rock excess. The success of their first album is massive. But, after a concert in Japan, the rest of the band discover magazines that feature only pictures of Cherie inside them - and are furious that they've been left out. Cherie begins to crumble under the pressures of being the face of the band, and starts to find solace in alcohol and drugs. As the band's stability disintegrates, can the girls rediscover the fun, runaway rock and roll lifestyle they sought?(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comic drama about a professor suffering from writer's block trying to deal with the pressures of his complex love life and his troubled students' assorted problems. Despite the encouragement of one his admiring female pupils, the professor is obsessed with his current work. He finds release in his friendship with a lonely but gifted student, but the news of his lover's pregnancy further complicates his already difficult life(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.desc: This portrait of England's "Virgin Queen" (Cate Blanchett) is a lush, romantic political thriller about the tumultuous reign of Elizabeth I, whose love for the dashing and duplicitous Earl of Leicester interferes with her duties to her troubled country, which could benefit from a political marriage to a French or Spanish nobleman. Joseph Fiennes, Geoffrey Rush(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I falls for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh and clashes with the King of Spain(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Spy thriller charting the life of the man charged with heading the CIA's covert operations and uncovering a mole during the Bay of Pigs scandal. Revealing how he changed from a once-idealistic student into the untrusting overlord of American espionage. Dir: Robert De Niro(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: The story of the blues in 1950s Chicago is told in Sony BMG Film's Cadillac Records, a musical drama written and directed by TV veteran Darnell Martin. The film stars Adrien Brody as Chess Records founder Leonard Chess, with Jeffrey Wright portraying R&B legend Muddy Waters, Cedric the Entertainer as Willie Dixon, Beyoncé Knowles as Etta James, and Mos Def doing his best Chuck Berry(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning
programme.desc: A single mum recruits her underachieving sister to help set up a lucrative crime scene clean-up business. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: Satire about a bullied personal assistant who decides to take revenge on his boss. When the young man starts his first job, with high hopes of building a career in the film world, he discovers he is to work for one of the most feared men in the business, a foul-mouthed, loathsome studio executive. As his treatment becomes increasingly hard to bear, he decides to exact a grim revenge against the tyrant(n)

programme.title: Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me
programme.desc: Drew DeNicola's documentary Big Star: Nothing Can Hurt Me traces the history of the highly influential power-pop band Big Star, which was headed by Alex Chilton. The band's three albums provided inspiration to a host of successful artists including R.E.M., The Replacements, and The Flaming Lips. Archival footage of the group is presented along with commentary from those who worked with them, as well as musicians who learned from their few albums(n)

programme.title: Lovely & Amazing
programme.desc: Following up from her directorial debut Walking and Talking, Nicole Holofcener spins this family drama about a mother and her three daughters who have almost nothing in common. The matriarch of the brood, Jane (Brenda Blethyn), is contemplating plastic surgery to rid herself of a middle-age paunch, in spite of some real potential health risks. Meanwhile, former high school beauty queen Michelle (Catherine Keener), the eldest of the three, lives a life of quiet desperation with two kids and a husband who refuses to understand her artistic yearnings. On the other hand, Elizabeth (Emily Mortimer), an actress whose career is about to take off, is in a loving marriage with James LeGros, though she remains insecure about her talents and abilities. Only the youngest daughter, eight-year-old African-American adoptee Annie (Raven Goodwin), seems likely to come out of the family without the neurosis or self-absorption of her elder siblings. This film was screened at the 2001 Toronto Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: In this sexy, frank comedy set in Victorian London, a young doctor named Mortimer goes to work for an older physician who specializes in treating "hysteria" in women, a condition he cures by manually manipulating them to achieve orgasm. An inventor friend of the young doc creates a device that will perform that service in a quicker fashion. Meanwhile, Mortimer falls in love with the older man's free-spirited, independent-minded daughter(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's 'Romeo & Juliet'
programme.desc: Shakespeare's great love story in a modern American setting. Young lovers Romeo and Juliet find their blossoming romance threatened by the rivalry between their two warring families - the Montagues and Capulets - who are determined to keep the couple apart, whatever the consequences(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning
programme.desc: A single mum recruits her underachieving sister to help set up a lucrative crime scene clean-up business. Comedy drama(n)
Fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings(n)

programme.title: Truth
programme.desc: Hard-hitting docudrama about the controversial 2004 "60 Minutes" exposé on then-president George W. Bush's military service, and the fallout that producer Mary Mapes and anchor Dan Rather suffered after the validity of key documents was questioned(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Jonathan Demme brought the subject of AIDS into the Hollywood mainstream with the story of attorney Andrew Beckett, whose fast-track career is ended when his employers discover that he is HIV-positive. When Beckett decides to sue his former employers, the only other lawyer willing to take on the case is a homophobe played by Denzel Washington(n)

programme.title: 5 Days of War
programme.desc: A war correspondent covers Russia's 2008 invasion of Georgia and attempts to help a teacher rescue her family during the chaos(n)

programme.title: Kill the Irishman
programme.desc: This biopic follows Cleveland union rep Danny Greene, who earned notoriety in the mid-'70s for his willingness to defy the Italian mob. A former Mafia enforcer, Greene managed to survive numerous assassination attempts, and eventually he dealt a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: Kevin Smith's hilarious sequel to his raunchy 1994 breakthrough movie revisits the world of New Jersey slackers Dante (Brian O'Halloran) and Randal (Jeff Anderson), who are now working at a fast-food restaurant. Rosario Dawson, Jason Mewes, Trevor Fehrman(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy concerning the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his clients to fend off the acquisitive attentions of a rival bodybuilding empire with designs on their virtually bankrupt facility. To generate much-needed cash, they enter a team in the national dodgeball competition and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team representing their foes(n)

programme.title: Imagine Me & You
programme.desc: Boy meets girl, boy falls for girl, boy marries girl, girl on wedding day falls for a female florist. It's a thorny dilemma indeed, and writer-director Ol Parker mines it for non-stop laughs and a bit of engaging sentiment. Piper Perabo and Lena Headey star as the ladies in love. Matthew Goode is very good as Perabo's jilted husband, and Darren Boyd is a scene-stealer as Goode's best friend who, despite knowing the bride's friend is a lesbian, doubles his efforts to woo her(n)

programme.title: Chocolat
programme.desc: Vianne's new chocolate shop is raising eyebrows and indignant, pious mayor Reynaud doesn't like it one bite. The confectioner's beauty, and her mysterious hold over the townsfolk, prompt Reynaud to plot against her. But the arrival of Irish gypsy Roux may give her the ally she needs(n)

programme.title: Pawn Shop Chronicles
programme.desc: In this delicious dose of cinematic insanity from the director of "Running Scared," a Southern pawn shop connects three outrageous tales involving kidnapping, racist meth heads and an inept Elvis impersonator(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy concerning the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his clients to fend off the acquisitive attentions of a rival bodybuilding empire with designs on their virtually bankrupt facility. To generate much-needed cash, they enter a team in the national dodgeball competition and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team representing their foes(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Cynical weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he travel to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day(n)

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Lovelorn Ben Stiller hires sleazy investigator Matt Dillon to track down high school sweetheart Cameron Diaz. Gross-out gag fest. Contains strong language/sexual scenes(n)

programme.title: Nine Months
programme.desc: Samuel has everything he's always wanted: a gorgeous girlfriend, San Francisco home, a fast car and... a baby? When Rebecca tells him she's pregnant, he's thrown into total confusion(n)

programme.title: Love Is All You Need
programme.desc: In this poignant love story, a widowed Englishman and a Danish hairdresser who's been left by her husband forge a fragile romance during a trip to Italy to see their son and daughter get married(n)

programme.title: Trust the Man
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about two couples fighting to save their relationships. Rebecca is an actress whose marriage to sex addict Tom is falling apart. Meanwhile, Rebecca's brother Tobey is in a long-term relationship with Elaine, but is scared of making a commitment. Will the couples stay together in the face of mounting problems and extramarital temptations?(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: An ordinary mall cop becomes a hero when he saves the day by stopping some goons from robbing the mall(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie, a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: Hanging Up
programme.desc: Meg Ryan gives a tender performance as a harried, high-class party planner in Los Angeles trying to maintain her sanity while caring for her ailing father without the help of her preoccupied, jet-setting sisters. Walter Matthau, Diane Keaton, Lisa Kudrow, Adam Arkin, Duke Moosekian(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat moves to Paris to pursue his unlikely dream of becoming a chef. With the help of a hapless kitchen boy, he puts his culinary skills to the test in the kitchen of a top restaurant while remaining in hiding, but eventually gets the chance to prove his prowess before a famous food critic. With the voices of Patton Oswalt, Brian Dennehy and Peter O'Toole(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: An ordinary mall cop becomes a hero when he saves the day by stopping some goons from robbing the mall(n)

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: Hit comedy about a couple who are called away from home unexpectedly and reluctantly choose Uncle Buck to look after their children for three weeks - with hilarious results!(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: Maggie, a young woman longing to start a family, becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
programme.desc: In an alternate 19th century English countryside, a fast-spreading zombie plague is threatening to bring the world to an end. Elizabeth Bennet who is trained in martial arts teams up with Mr. Darcy to battle the zombie apocalypse, and discover their love for one another(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: An ordinary mall cop becomes a hero when he saves the day by stopping some goons from robbing the mall(n)

programme.title: Uncle Buck
programme.desc: Hit comedy about a couple who are called away from home unexpectedly and reluctantly choose Uncle Buck to look after their children for three weeks - with hilarious results!(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: A black comedy about a frustrated puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office(n)

programme.title: Coffy
programme.desc: When drugs make a mess of her sister, nurse Coffy hits the streets with a shotgun to go after the human vermin she holds responsible. Ferocious urban action from the same 'blaxploitation' stable as Foxy Brown and Cleopatra Jones(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: Broad comedy about a financially insecure economics graduate who agrees to participate in a drug trial. The drug in question enhances the subject's senses, and he uses his newly developed powers to get ahead in business. For a while, he enjoys the good life - but then the drug begins to show some unusual side effects(n)

programme.title: The Constant Gardener
programme.desc: Quiet diplomat Justin searches for answers when his activist wife is murdered in Kenya. Rachel Weisz won an Oscar for her remarkable performance in John Le Carré's thrilling murder mystery(n)

programme.title: Private Parts
programme.desc: Tracing the turbulent career of radio and TV shock-jock Howard Stern, including his experiences as a struggling kid, his first attempts at spicing up his talk show, his married life and his rise to fame at New York's WNBC. Robin Quivers, Fred Norris, Mary McCormack, Gary Dell' Abate, Jackie Martling(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: Christopher McQuarrie's (writer of The Usual Suspects) directorial debut stars Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe as a couple of small time crooks who decide to kidnap and ransom Juliette Lewis, surrogate mother of wealthy Scott Wilson. They figure he'll pay big but what they don't know are his connections which includes veteran 'cleaner' (James Caan), who knows all about finding and dealing with 'problems'(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: War drama starring Matthew Broderick and Denzel Washington, and adapted from letters sent by Colonel Robert G Shaw, an officer in the Federal Army during the American Civil War. Shaw volunteered to lead the first company of black soldiers, and had to face the bigotry of both the army's enemies and of his fellow officers(n)

programme.title: Daylight's End
programme.desc: A rogue warrior wanders the globe after a plague turns most of humanity into bloodthirsty creatures. He comes across a few survivors trapped in a police station, and decides to help fight for their safety(n)

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda
programme.desc: In 1994, Rwanda's Hutu extremists massacred almost a million of their Tutsi countrymen. This Oscar-nominated drama tells the true story of how hotel manager Paul Rusesabagina saved hundreds of Rwandan lives(n)

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: A team of skydiving crooks led by DEA-agent-turned-bad Busey specialize in landing on police roofs and breaking in so their evil computer nerd can steal undercover agents' files and sell them to drug lords. Federal Marshal Snipes lost a brother to this crew and learns skydiving with the help of tough-but-lovable instructor Butler so he can track them down(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: In this sci-fi/horror scarefest, Dr. William Weir (Sam Neill) is a scientist who has designed a spacecraft called Event Horizon which will explore the outer reaches of space past the planet Neptune; the ship employs a special transport mechanism that, in effect, creates a black hole that the ship can pass through, allowing it to travel tremendous distances in a few seconds. The Event Horizon mysteriously disappears in the midst of a mission with no trace of either the ship or its crew, but it reappears in Neptune's orbit after a seven year absence and it's sending out a distress signal. The spaceship Lewis and Clark, and Dr. Weir, are sent to investigate; the crew -- Captain Miller (Laurence Fishburne), pilot Smith (Sean Pertwee), engineer Justin (Jack Noseworthy), navigator Starck (Joely Richardson), physician D.J. (Jason Isaacs), and emergency technicians Peters (Kathleen Quinlan) and Cooper (Richard T. Jones) -- are already tired and unenthusiastic about this assignment, and somewhat confused by Weir's reports. The crew of the Lewis and Clark are convinced that Weir is not telling them something, and when they discover the Event Horizon, they find that things are not what they seem, and an evil presence has taken over the ship. Incidentally, the term "event horizon" describes the outer boundaries of a black hole(n)

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Death is back and he wants more victims in this follow-up to the teen horror hit Final Destination. Clear Rivers, the only survivor of the original cull, is recruited by Kimberley Corman to stop his second campaign. Corman foresaw a freeway pileup but those she saved are now marked. Can the pair, with the help of Officer Burke and the knowledge of the sage William Bludworth, save those marked for death?(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: Christopher McQuarrie's (writer of The Usual Suspects) directorial debut stars Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe as a couple of small time crooks who decide to kidnap and ransom Juliette Lewis, surrogate mother of wealthy Scott Wilson. They figure he'll pay big but what they don't know are his connections which includes veteran 'cleaner' (James Caan), who knows all about finding and dealing with 'problems'(n)

Robin Quivers, Fred Norris, Mary McCormack, Gary Dell' Abate, Jackie Martling(n)

programme.title: Silver Streak
programme.desc: George, a mild-mannered guy on a cross-country train trip, becomes embroiled in a deadly adventure when he falls in love with Hilly, a woman on the verge of exposing art forgers. George must eventually team with a fast-talking criminal in order to outwit bad guys intending to kill both him and Hilly(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as Howard Langston, workaholic dad to Jamie (Jake Lloyd). All Jamie wants for Christmas is the must-have toy Turbo Man but it's Christmas Eve and it's sold out everywhere. As Howard sets out on a quest to find one, he's joined by rival Myron Larabee (Sinbad) and the two battle it out as they search high and low for the toy. Meanwhile, back home, Howard's increasingly disillusioned wife Liz (Rita Wilson) becomes the object of desire for neighbour Ted Maltin (Phil Hartman) in Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy(n)

programme.title: Jumpin' Jack Flash
programme.desc: Lively comedy about a bored computer programmer whose terminal suddenly flashes up a message from a spy asking for help, drawing her into the world of international espionage. Her humdrum life in a New York bank is swapped for an adventure involving sinister characters including a British agent trapped behind the Iron Curtain and a spy who winds up face down in the East River(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: A Los Angeles detective encounters high strangeness in his search for a missing woman and a 30-million-dollar cache of diamonds in this off-beat mystery thriller from Otis director Tony Krantz. Ned Cruz (Antonio Banderas) is the kind of detective people come to when all of their other resources have run dry. Approached by paroled Russian boxer Anton (Robert Maillet) to track down his elusive girlfriend, Lexie (Sienna Guillory), and recover the stash of diamonds she has stolen, Detective Cruz calls on all of his connections to get the job done. Eventually, his investigation leads him from a kinky Hollywood action icon (James Van Der Beek) to a multi-talented pornographer (Snoop Dogg) and a physics-obsessed waitress (Autumn Reeser) with an insatiable sexual appetite. Ned's hard work starts to pay off, however, when he ventures deep into the New Mexico desert, where an eccentric billionaire (Sam Elliott) and a brilliant physicist (Jimmi Simpson) have hatched a plan to recreate the Big Bang. Now, with the cops hot on his tail and a potentially catastrophic experiment unfolding right beneath his feet, Ned races to find the girl and recover the diamonds before the world comes to an end(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A female-led reboot of the classic franchise(n)

programme.title: Chico & Rita
programme.desc: Animated film about Chico, a young piano player, who falls in love with Rita, a singer, in 1948 Cuba. Music and romantic desire unites them, but their journey - in the tradition of the Latin ballad, the bolero - brings heartache and torment. From Havana to New York, Paris, Hollywood and Las Vegas, two passionate individuals battle impossible odds to unite in music and love. Dir: Fernando Trueba, Xavier Mariscal, Tono Errando. (In Spanish with English subtitles)(n)

Her humdrum life in a New York bank is swapped for an adventure involving sinister characters including a British agent trapped behind the Iron Curtain and a spy who winds up face down in the East River(n)

programme.title: Some Kind of Hero
programme.desc: Richard Pryor as a Vietnam vet trying to adjust. Margot Kidder, Ray Sharkey. Powers: Ronny Cox. Lisa: Lynne Moody. Jesse: Olivia Cole. Leon: Paul Benjamin. Michael Pressman directed(n)

Approached by paroled Russian boxer Anton (Robert Maillet) to track down his elusive girlfriend, Lexie (Sienna Guillory), and recover the stash of diamonds she has stolen, Detective Cruz calls on all of his connections to get the job done. Eventually, his investigation leads him from a kinky Hollywood action icon (James Van Der Beek) to a multi-talented pornographer (Snoop Dogg) and a physics-obsessed waitress (Autumn Reeser) with an insatiable sexual appetite. Ned's hard work starts to pay off, however, when he ventures deep into the New Mexico desert, where an eccentric billionaire (Sam Elliott) and a brilliant physicist (Jimmi Simpson) have hatched a plan to recreate the Big Bang. Now, with the cops hot on his tail and a potentially catastrophic experiment unfolding right beneath his feet, Ned races to find the girl and recover the diamonds before the world comes to an end(n)

programme.title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
programme.desc: When a nefarious villain named Ultron emerges to threaten mankind, the next generation of superheroes leaps into action and prepares to make their famous parents proud. It's been decades since Ultron defeated the original Avengers, and these days even the few folks that had held out hope for the future are finally ready to admit defeat. But Tony Stark has a surprise up his sleeve in the form of four amazing teenagers who just might have the power to defeat Ultron once and for all. But will James (son of Captain America and Black Widow), Pym (son of Wasp and Giant Man), Torunn (daughter of Thor) and Azari (son of the Black Panther) truly be capable of defeating the villain who brought about the downfall of their powerful parents? As the battle gets underway and Hawkeye's sharp-shooting son leaps into the fray, the team realizes that they might stand a fighting chance if they can only track down the mission Hulk and encourage him to become a member of the team. Should they succeed in defeating Ultron, this group will forever be known as The Next Avengers(n)

programme.title: Lake Placid 3
programme.desc: When a game warden and his family moves Lake Placid, the little boy feeds the rbaby crocodiles. The story takes a turn when they grow into monstrous predators(n)

programme.title: Lake Placid 2
programme.desc: The serine waters of Lake Placid stir once again in this sequel that finds laid-back Sheriff James Riley (John Schneider) teaming with an inquisitive Fish and Wildlife Agent (Sarah LaFleur), a quick-triggered big game hunter (Sam McMurray), and his intuitive guide (Joe Holt) to investigate suspicions that another killer crock may be on the loose in the rural community. Two years ago, a pair of thirty foot-long prehistoric crocodiles terrorized the residents of Lake Placid. While most of the locals assumed that the nightmare had ended when the murderous creatures were killed, local crocodile lover Sadie (Cloris Leachman) knows that the truth is far more terrifying. Beneath the surface of Lake Placid, the remaining predators have been quietly reproducing, awaiting the moment they will emerge from the water and cement their status on the top of the food chain. Now, as Sheriff Riley's rebellious teenage son (Shad Collins) departs for a relaxing lakeside camping trip, the desperate father realizes the danger that lies beneath the surface and races to confront a prehistoric predator that won't stop until it's consumed every last local(n)

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: When people begin to disappear at a secluded lake in the Maine wilderness in this pulse-pounding thriller, an investigative team discovers that a ferocious giant crocodile is the culprit(n)

programme.title: Skyfall
programme.desc: 007 (Daniel Craig) becomes M's only ally as MI6 comes under attack, and a mysterious new villain emerges with a diabolical plan. James Bond's latest mission has gone horribly awry, resulting in the exposure of several undercover agents, and an all-out attack on M16. Meanwhile, as M (Judi Dench) plans to relocate the agency, emerging Chairman of the Intelligence and Security Committee Mallory (Ralph Fiennes) raises concerns about her competence while attempting to usurp her position, and Q (Ben Whishaw) becomes a crucial ally. Now the only person who can restore M's reputation is 007. Operating in the dark with only field agent Eve (Naomie Harris) to guide him, the world's top secret agent works to root out an enigmatic criminal mastermind named Silva (Javier Bardem) as a major storm brews on the horizon. Albert Finney also stars in the 23rd installment of the long-running spy series. The film was directed by Sam Mendes (American Beauty, Revolutionary Road) and shot by acclaimed cinematographer Roger Deakins (True Grit, The Reader, The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford)(n)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Married Man Sleepover. When Chef Nicolas invites Caroline to dinner at his flat, claiming his wife has no objection to their relationship, she asks Max and Deke to join her to prevent her from doing anything that she might regret. The girls treat themselves to a special hairdressing appointment, and Max ponders the topic of birth control(n)

programme.title: The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines
programme.desc: Noah Wyle stars as librarian Flynn Carsen, the unlikely hero who goes on the hunt for the secrets of King Solomon's mines. Thrilling action adventure(n)

programme.title: Kicking & Screaming
programme.desc: Immaturity and poor sportsmanship once again find their firmly established place in children's athletics (at least among the adults) in this sports comedy. Phil Weston (Will Ferrell) is a tightly wound suburban father who had a competitive streak worn into him by his father, Buck (Robert Duvall), who never seemed to feel that his son measured up. When Phil's son joins a Little League soccer team, Phil signs on as coach, only to learn that Buck -- who also has a ten-year-old son these days -- will be coaching a team in the same league. Determined to show his father he can do the job, Phil impresses upon his young charges that winning is the only important thing, and soon gains a few enemies as he humiliates not only the kids on his own team, but their opponents as well. Directed by Jesse Dylan, Kicking & Screaming also features Kate Walsh and legendary football coach Mike Ditka. The screenplay was authored by Steve Rudnick and Leo Benvenuti (The Santa Clause) prior to the latter's death in 2000(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Chandler's Work Laugh
programme.desc: The One with Chandler's Work Laugh. When Ross discovers that Emily is getting remarried, he hits a new low by sleeping with one of Chandlers old flames...Janice!(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: The One Where Everybody Finds Out. A focal point for many of this season's episodes, Monica (Courteney Cox) and Chandler's (Matthew Perry) secret romance is revealed here. Ugly Naked Guy is moving out and Ross (David Schwimmer) wants his apartment. To gain an upper hand in a flurry of bids, Ross goes nude with him. Looking out their window, Joey notices that Ugly Naked Guy has a friend; a shocked Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) proclaims, "It's Naked Ross!" While checking out Ross' new apartment, Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow) looks out the window and sees Monica and Chandler having sex. Deciding to use the information to play jokes on them, Phoebe begins making passes at Chandler. This leads to a flirting showdown between the two where they kiss and freak each other out. Soon everyone knows about Monica and Chandler except Ross, who eventually sees them kiss out of his new apartment's window. This episode originally aired on February 11, 1999(n)

programme.sub-title: The One with the Girl Who Hits Joey

programme.title: A Walk to Remember
programme.desc: In a coastal North Carolinian small town in the mid 1990's, a boy from the popular but troubled undirected group of students gets busted, and for punishment, you guessed it, has to do community service activities which include the high school's spring play. This throws him in with the minister's daughter, you guessed it, the mousy seemingly awkward yet beautiful girl with an angelic heart and she sings too. They grow hesitantly closer than their previous adversarial relationship as old bonds are tested and new awareness's are inspired. A couple of twists occur as the story concludes(n)

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: When Shrek married Fiona, the last thing he wanted was to rule Far Far Away, but when his frogger-in-law, King Harold, suddenly croaks, Shrek is quickly fitted for the crown. Now, unless the reluctant would-be king can find a suitable replacement, he'll be royally screwed for the rest of his days(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Weaker Sex. Al (Ed O'Neill) scoffs when Peg (Katey Sagal) and Marcy (Amanda Bearse) enroll in a self-defense class, dismissing all women as weaklings. But the tables are turned when Peg beats up a pickpocket while Al watches helplessly from the sidelines. Mocked by the media (one headline reads "CHOP-SOCKY MAMA SAVES WUSSY-HUBBY'S WALLET") and treated like a leper by his male buddies, Al takes desperate measures to reassert his manhood(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Flight of the Bumblebee. In order to become a member of Al's macho NO MA'AM organization, Bud (David Faustino) must go through an initiation ritual that is seemingly dreamed up on the spot. Bud's challenge is to crash the nationally televised "WrestlePalooza" match and get his picture taken with the legendary King Kong Bundy (no relation, of course). The result: Dressed in an idiotic bumblebee costume, Bud finds himself squaring off against Bundy in a no-holds-barred grappling match!(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Blonde and Blonder. Attending their five-year high school reunion, Kelly (Christina Applegate) and her best friend Jessica (Sarah Ann Morris) are shocked to discover that onetime classroom nerd Eric (Casper Van Dien) is now a handsome hunk--and a millionaire to boot. Once the girls have recovered, they fall over themselves trying to win Eric's heart. . .while Kelly does everything in her power to make Eric forget that she once stood him up on New Year's Eve. Meanwhile, the Bundys don't quite understand the purpose of Marcy's "guns for toys" drive. Seen in this episode as Bud's girlfriend Ashley is former Playboy centerfold Heidi Mark(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: The Two that Got Away. After discovering that their fishing-lodge reservation has been claimed by voluptuous film star Shannon Tweed, Al (Ed O'Neill) and Jefferson (Ted McGinley) are unexpectedly handed an opportunity to capitalize on the situation when Jefferson takes a picture of a nude Sharon in a compromising hot-tub situation--which the boys then proceed to auction off to the tabloids. Elsewhere, Bud (David Faustino) and Kelly (Christina Applegate) help their dog Lucky prepare for a dog-food commercial, but it is Kelly who ends up doing "stupid human tricks". Featured in the cast are Joe Sagal, the brother of series star Katey Sagal (Peg), and former Playboy centerfolds Shae Marks and Donna D'Errico(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Dud Bowl II. Marcy (Amanda Bearse) is appalled when the bank where she works (Kyoto National) announces plans to donate a scoreboard to Polk High School--to be named after the school's greatest football hero, Al Bundy (Ed O'Neill). Determined to cheat Al of this honor, Marcy thinks she has found a loophole when she discovers that former Super Bowl champ Terry Bradshaw once attended Polk High for two whole months. Listen as the studio audience cheers when Bradshaw (as himself) invokes memories of the "immaculate reception" of 1972. This episode was originally telecast in tandem with Al Bundy's Sports Spectacular, a montage of sports-related clips from past Married. . .With Children installments hosted by Roy Firestone(n)

programme.title: Married...With Children
programme.desc: Bearly Men. To prove their manhood, Bud and Al go hunting with Peggy's father. But even though they bag a bear, they don't accomplish their goal(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One on the Last Night
programme.desc: The One on the Last Night. Chandler tries to give Joey money(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One Where Phoebe Runs. New living arrangements pose problems for Rachel (Jennifer Aniston), Monica (Courteney Cox), Chandler (Matthew Perry), Joey (Matt LeBlanc), and Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow). For starters, new roomies Phoebe and Rachel decide to work out together by running every day, a decision that makes Phoebe feel like a fool. In another development, Joey is fascinated by his sexy new roommate, Janine (Elle MacPherson in her first series appearance), little realizing the trouble she has in store for him. Finally, Chandler bollixes up the simple task of cleaning Monica's apartment, thanks to a faulty memory(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with Ross's Teeth. Ross over-whitens his teeth in order to impress his date. Phoebe may or may not have made out with Ralph Lauren which gets Rachel into trouble with her boss(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Apothecary Table
programme.desc: The One with the Apothecary Table. Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) has a monkey on her back! No, Marcel hasn't returned; it is simply that Rachel has become hopelessly addicted to purchasing Pottery Barn furniture (her latest acquisition is an apothecary table). Can she hide this horrible secret from Phoebe (Elle MacPherson), who despises all mass-produced products? Meanwhile, it appears as though Janine (Elle MacPherson) is driving a wedge between Joey (Matt LeBlanc) and the rest of the gang(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One with the Joke. Chandler is upset when Playboy prints Ross's joke(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The One With Rachel's Sister. In the first episode of a two-part story, Reese Witherspoon guest stars as Jill Green, spoiled-rotten kid sister of Rachel Green (Jennifer Aniston). Showing up at Rachel's doorstep after her parents have cut off her allowance, Jill expects her sister to help her get her life together. Alas, the old sibling rivalry roars into flame when Jill suddenly becomes very, very interested in Ross (David Schwimmer). Elsewhere, Chandler (Matthew Perry) can't cope with the fact that Monica (Courteney Cox) has both a bad head cold and an enormous yearning for his body, and Joey (Matt LeBlanc) picks the wrong time to be generous(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One That Could Have Been
programme.desc: The One That Could Have Been. In the first half of a two-part story (originally telecast as a single hour-long episode), the divorce of their friends Barry and Mindy leads the gang to imagine how their lives might have turned out had they made different choices in life. In this parallel universe of the mind, Monica (Courteney Cox) is overweight and a virgin; Rachel (Jennifer Aniston) has a crush on famous soap opera leading man Joey (Matt LeBlanc); Ross (David Schwimmer) is still wed to a "straight" Carol (Jane Sibbett); and Phoebe (Lisa Kudrow) has a high-paying job on Wall Street -- and a bad heart condition! The "alternate reality" theme of this episode is even carried over into the opening credits(n)

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One That Could Have Been
programme.desc: The One That Could Have Been. Conclusion. As the gang pictures their lives with different outcomes, Chandler still falls for Monica, while Ross works on his marriage to Carol (Jane Sibbett), who is a closeted lesbian. Susan: Jessica Hecht. Barry: Mitchell Whitfield(n)

programme.title: The Cleveland Show
programme.desc: Dancing With the Stools. Donna recruits Cleveland Jr. to be her partner for Stoolbend's annual ballroom-dancing contest, and he responds by telling her that he's in love with her. Meanwhile, Roberta babysits Rallo for a week and learns a lesson about domestic responsibilities(n)

programme.title: The Cleveland Show
programme.desc: Brown Magic. Excited to spend quality father-stepson bonding time with Rallo, Cleveland takes Rallo to his very first magic show, where they get hired to be the opening act. Thanks to Rallo's sharp wit in the role of the puppet, Cleveland and Rallo's ventriloquist act becomes a hit. As their act gets rave reviews by fans and ventriloquist critic Graham Kensington (guest voice Bryan Cranston), Rallo grows tired of Cleveland taking all the credit for their success. Not one to be taken for a dummy, Rallo proves that he is the heart of their comedic act(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Tears of a Clooney. Francine plots to destroy George Clooney; Roger builds a vineyard and starts a private sweatshop(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Camp Refoogee. When Stan tries to trick Steve into attending summer camp, things go horribly wrong and Steve ends up in a refugee camp. Stan, being the eternal optimist, joins Steve and manages to stage a camp Olympics between the refugees and the rebel faction living across the river(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.sub-title: The American Dad After School Special
programme.desc: The American Dad After School Special. When Steve falls for an overweight girl, the appearance-obsessed Stan is so appalled by the way she looks that he becomes anorexic. Roger falls for her too, and attempts to sabotage her relationship with Steve(n)

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.sub-title: Failure Is Not a Factory-Installed Option
programme.desc: Failure Is Not a Factory-Installed Option. Stan loses his self-confidence after an auto salesman keeps getting him to buy cars he doesn't want, and he leaves the family in shame to find himself. Soon all are mired in poverty, but Steve finds a use for the cars. Meanwhile, a veteran police detective (voice of Beau Bridges) picks up an odd, if valuable, piece of evidence that turns out to be a hot poker. Other voices include Swoosie Kurtz, Christine Baranski, Patrick Stewart and Elias Koteas(n)

programme.desc: The Cook, the Steve, the Gayle, & Her Lover. Bob hosts a dinner party to bond with his new friend, while Gayle seizes the opportunity to introduce her new boyfriend to the family, unbeknownst to her that Louise has an on-going feud with the guy and is determined to break them up(n)

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: The Gene and Courtney Show. Gene and Courtney's request to become the new hosts of morning announcements may be complicated by their romantic relationship, while Tina volunteers to head the Valentine's Day carnation fundraiser, where her attempt to play Cupid misses the mark(n)

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Sexy Dance Healing. A slip on the sidewalk forces Bob to initiate legal action to pay for his surgery, after which he comes under the care of Jairo, who intends to heal him without using a physician.Meanwhile, the kids fabricate a law firm to settle their personal differences(n)

programme.title: Bob's Burgers
programme.desc: Sacred Couch. A vote to buy a new sofa is held by the Belchers on TV night, but Louise isn't going to take the results lying down(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Road to Vegas. Stewie and Brian use Stewie's teleportation device to go to Las Vegas for a Celine Dion concert, but chaos ensues when the machine malfunctions and creates alt-versions of the pair: a "lucky" version and an "unlucky" one(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Finders Keepers. Peter takes the whole family out to dinner to celebrate having a rotten shrimp removed from his mouth by the dentist. programme.desc: A shy, awkward chemistry teacher harbours a crush on a beautiful student. When he creates a potion that transforms him into an irresistible ladies' man, he comes close to attracting her attention - but at every critical moment the effects of the elixir wear off. Comedy, starring Jerry Lewis, Stella Stevens, Howard Morris and Kathleen Freeman.(n)

programme.title: Passport to Pimlico
programme.desc: The residents of a London suburb discover documents proving their neighbourhood is not part of Britain, and declare independence. Appointing their own head of state, they begin erecting borders as the government resorts to desperate measures to bring the community back under British rule. Ealing comedy, starring Stanley Holloway and Margaret Rutherford.(n)

programme.title: The Far Country
programme.desc: A cowpoke is steering his cattle north to the Canadian border when a corrupt sheriff commandeers the herd. A local saloon-bar owner falls for the hapless cowboy, and with her help he recaptures his cattle. Hooking up with a wagon train, the couple head for the mining town of Dawson, but the thwarted and embittered sheriff is on their tail. Western, with James Stewart, Walter Brennan and Ruth Roman.(n)

programme.title: Rio Lobo
programme.desc: A former Union Army colonel heads for Texas to recover a shipment of gold bullion stolen from a payroll train during the American Civil War and settle a few old scores along the way. Howard Hawks' Western, starring John Wayne, Jorge Rivero, Christopher Mitchum, Jack Elam, Jennifer O'Neill and Mike Henry.(n)

programme.title: Catlow
programme.desc: A drifter pulls off a major robbery and flees into Apache territory, only to find himself hunted by a vengeful outlaw, a lawman whose life he saved, and the Mexican army. Western, with Yul Brynner, Richard Crenna, Leonard Nimoy and Jo Ann Pflug.(n)

programme.title: The Cowboys
programme.desc: An ageing rancher finds himself short-handed when his workers abandon him during a gold rush, and grudgingly hires a group of schoolboys to help him on a 400-mile cattle drive. Although at first they feel out of their depth, the youngsters quickly learn to work like men - but face a dangerous challenge ahead as a gang of rustlers begins to stalk them. Western, with John Wayne, Roscoe Lee Browne and Bruce Dern.(n)

programme.title: Wild Stallion
programme.desc: A homesteader couple are murdered, and the prize of their livestock, a white stallion, escapes into the wild. Their son also survives, and is taken in by a cavalry officer. He grows up to be a tracker, catching horses to sell to the army, but his lifelong goal is to be reunited with his childhood steed. Western, starring Ben Johnson, Edgar Buchanan and Martha Hyer.(n)

programme.desc: A serial killer has the people of Memphis city living in fear of their lives, until a renowned homicide detective is assigned the task of bringing his reign of terror to an end. He also has to contend with a second homicidal maniac, as well as an FBI agent who does not approve of his brutal methods. Action thriller, starring Steven Seagal, Holly Elissa Dignard and Chris Thomas King.(n)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: An upper-class suburban teenager gets involved with a prostitute while his parents are away on holiday, turning the family home into a brothel and jeopardising his plans for the future. Coming-of-age comedy, starring Tom Cruise, Rebecca De Mornay, Bronson Pinchot and Joe Pantoliano.(n)

programme.desc: Jesse investigates stories of government experiments in mind control intended to turn ordinary people into assassins.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Expert. This Emmy Award-winner for Outstanding Drama Series also holds the record for receiving the most consecutive nominations in that category. In the first half-hour, police detectives investigate crimes and arrest suspects, while in the second half-hour, the focus shifts to the complications of the justice system. programme.desc: The Things We Left Behind. Castiel finds Jimmy's daughter Claire in a group home and she convinces him to break her out. After she runs away from him, Castiel calls Sam and Dean to help find her before she gets into trouble. Meanwhile, Crowley faces his biggest challenge(n)

programme.title: The Mechanic
programme.desc: Seasoned hitman Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) sets out to avenge the brutal murder of his mentor, Harry (Donald Sutherland), and finds himself joined by Harry's vengeful son (Ben Foster), who is eager to follow in his late father's footsteps, in this remake of the 1972 action thriller starring Charles Bronson and Jan-Michael Vincent. Harry taught Arthur how to be a detached killer who always hits his mark. Now Harry is gone, and for the first time in Arthur's career it's about to get personal. As lone-wolf assassin Arthur prepares to hunt down Harry's killers, he is approached by his fallen mentor's vengeful son, Steve, who is eager to take up the lethal tools of his father's trade. Unadept at working with a partner yet compelled to help Steve carry on the family tradition, Arthur agrees to take him on as a protégé. Later, the duo begins to methodically eliminate their targets, forging a partnership born of blood with each new hit. The closer Arthur and Steve get to the name at the top of their list, however, the more apparent it becomes that his job will be anything but business as usual(n)

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: In this nonstop action epic, stoic soldier of fortune Barney Ross and his team of mercenaries are hired to take out a tyrannical South American dictator and soon find themselves facing off against a former CIA operative gone rogue(n)

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Barney Ross and his team of mercenaries embark on a seemingly routine assignment, but after one of their own is killed, the gang decide to fight their way through hostile territory in order to avenge his death and prevent weapons-grade plutonium from falling into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: Olympus Has Fallen
programme.desc: An ex-Secret Service agent fights back against terrorists who have taken over the White House and kidnapped the president. Trapped by hostile forces, he must prevent the incident from spiraling into all-out war(n)
